translation.en: [man over megaphone] Mr. Miller?
translation.zh: 米勒先生？

translation.en: Is everyone okay in there?
translation.zh: 里面的人没事吧？

translation.en: Agent Ford, FBI.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局 福特特工

translation.en: Here, sir.
translation.zh: 这边 先生

translation.en: [man over megaphone] We want to know what's going on.
translation.zh: 我们想知道里面的情况

translation.en: If you harm anyone, it will not end well for you!
translation.zh: 如果有人受伤 你是不会有好下场的

translation.en: Special Agent Holden Ford.
translation.zh: 我是福特特工

translation.en: -Ninkovich. -Is he talking?
translation.zh: -我是宁科维奇 -他有说话吗？

translation.en: Not making sense. Been briefed?
translation.zh: 全是胡扯 你听简报了吗？

translation.en: On the way over. Five people still in there?
translation.zh: 来的路上了解过了 里面还有五个人？

translation.en: A security guard, the secretary, three guys from the line.
translation.zh: 一名保安、一个秘书 三个电话公司的人

translation.en: -[Miller] Where is she? -[Ninkovich] Take it easy, Mr. Miller.
translation.zh: 她在哪儿？ 别着急 米勒先生

translation.en: [Miller] I want my wife!
translation.zh: 我要见我妻子！

translation.en: Put the gun down, step away from Ms. Curtwell.
translation.zh: 把枪放下 放开科特维尔小姐

translation.en: -[Miller] I have asked you-- -We need to see that everyone is unharmed.
translation.zh: 我让你们… 我们需要确保人质没有受伤

translation.en: You gonna shoot me?
translation.zh: 你要开枪打死我吗？

translation.en: If you do not abide by our terms, and soon--
translation.zh: 如果你不按我们说的做 马上…

translation.en: You can't see me!
translation.zh: 你们看不到我的！

translation.en: I'm warning you, our patience is wearing thin.
translation.zh: 我警告你 我们耐心所剩无余

translation.en: How can you shoot what you can't see?
translation.zh: 你们看不见我 怎么开枪打我？

translation.en: Mr. Miller!
translation.zh: 米勒先生！

translation.en: -No, thank you. -[feedback squeals]
translation.zh: 不 谢谢

translation.en: Hey, Cody.
translation.zh: 嘿 科迪

translation.en: My name is Holden. I'd like to help you.
translation.zh: 我叫霍顿 我是来帮你的

translation.en: -Tell me what's going on. -I gotta talk to my wife.
translation.zh: -告诉我是怎么回事 -我要跟我妻子谈

translation.en: -[Holden] All right. -She's the only one.
translation.zh: -好的 -我只跟她谈

translation.en: I understand.
translation.zh: 我明白

translation.en: For the moment, is there anything else we can get you?
translation.zh: 现在你有什么其他要求吗？

translation.en: Get these fucking people away.
translation.zh: 让他们都滚开

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Okay... -[camera shutters clicking]
translation.zh: 好…

translation.en: If I can get them to back off,
translation.zh: 我可以让他们离开

translation.en: will you... relax with Ms. Curtwell?
translation.zh: 你能不能…放了科特维尔小姐？

translation.en: Give us some time to reach your wife.
translation.zh: 给我们一些时间联系你妻子

translation.en: [Miller] Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Keep the snipers. Back out the perimeter.
translation.zh: 留下狙击手 其他人退到警戒线以外

translation.en: If he starts firing, we'll have to storm the place.
translation.zh: 如果他开枪 我们得立即冲进去

translation.en: They're making me nervous. Imagine what they're doing to him.
translation.zh: 我都被这些人搞得紧张不堪 更别说他了

translation.en: He has no criminal history. He's clearly having an episode.
translation.zh: 他没有犯罪记录 显然是在犯病

translation.en: We need to keep him calm and wear him down.
translation.zh: 我们需要让他冷静下来 慢慢说服他

translation.en: Get rid of those reporters.
translation.zh: 让那些记者也都离开

translation.en: All right, guys. Back it up!
translation.zh: 好了 伙计们 撤退！

translation.en: -[man] All right. Let's go. Back it up. -[man 2] Move back.
translation.zh: 行了 兄弟们 我们撤 -撤退 -听从指令

translation.en: How am I doing?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: -[Miller] You see me? -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -你看得到我吗？ -老天

translation.en: Yes, I can see you!
translation.zh: 是的 我看得到你！

translation.en: -What do you see? -[Holden] I can see that you're naked.
translation.zh: 那你都看到了什么？ 我看到你一丝不挂

translation.en: I can see that you're cold.
translation.zh: 看得出你很冷

translation.en: Is there a phone? Can we get him on the line?
translation.zh: 屋里有电话吗？能跟他通电话吗？

translation.en: -He's got it off the hook. -That was his demand, talk to his wife?
translation.zh: -他把电话线拔了 -跟妻子谈话是他唯一的要求吗？

translation.en: Took all day to find her. She's on her way.
translation.zh: 花了一整天才找到她 在来的路上

translation.en: -You're not bringing her. -I want her to calm him.
translation.zh: -你不能让她过来 -我希望她能安抚他的情绪

translation.en: Her presence might have the opposite effect.
translation.zh: 她的出现可能会帮倒忙

translation.en: Hi, Mrs. Miller? Don't get out.
translation.zh: 你好 米勒夫人？别下车

translation.en: I'm Holden Ford from the FBI. Do you understand the situation?
translation.zh: 我是霍顿·福特 联邦调查局特工 你了解目前的情况吗？

translation.en: -Cody's got some people in there? -What happened this morning?
translation.zh: -科迪绑了几名人质在里面？ -今早出什么事了？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I tried to get him sectioned on Sunday, but I haven't seen him since.
translation.zh: 我周日试图强制送他入院 但自那以后就一直没见到他

translation.en: They told me he stole a shotgun, robbed a liquor store?
translation.zh: 他们告诉我他偷了一支散弹枪 抢劫了一家烟酒店？

translation.en: Was he delusional? Violent?
translation.zh: 他有幻觉吗？暴力倾向？

translation.en: He's not violent.
translation.zh: 他没有暴力倾向

translation.en: He's been saying that he's invisible for a while now.
translation.zh: 他一直说自己是隐形人 这种情况有一段日子了

translation.en: Truly invisible. He's been seeing a doctor.
translation.zh: 说自己完全隐身 他有看医生

translation.en: Did the doctor diagnose him?
translation.zh: 医生说他是什么病？

translation.en: Cody wouldn't tell me.
translation.zh: 科迪不肯告诉我

translation.en: He's taking medication, but he might've stopped.
translation.zh: 医生给开了药 他应该是没再吃了

translation.en: -What kind of medication? -I'm not sure.
translation.zh: -什么药？ -我也不知道

translation.en: Here's his doctor.
translation.zh: 就是这个医生

translation.en: You tried to get him sectioned?
translation.zh: 你为什要强制送他入院？

translation.en: He kept talking to people that weren't there, saying they could see him.
translation.zh: 他一直对不存在的人说话 说那些人看得到他

translation.en: I told him I was gonna leave him if he didn't go to the hospital.
translation.zh: 我跟他说如果他不去医院 我就离开他

translation.en: -You gave him an ultimatum? -[Mrs. Miller sobbing] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你给了他最后期限？ 真的很抱歉

translation.en: -I feel awful. -This is not your fault.
translation.zh: -我觉得糟透了 -不是你的错

translation.en: Has he hurt anyone?
translation.zh: 他有没有伤害到别人？

translation.en: Not that we know about. I'm sending you along for now.
translation.zh: 据我们所知 还没有 我让人送你离开

translation.en: Have someone call his doctor.
translation.zh: 联系他的医生

translation.en: Get his wife to tell him she won't leave him.
translation.zh: 让他妻子跟他说不会离开他

translation.en: We need more information. Let's see if we can get him on the line.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多信息 试试看能不能跟他通电话

translation.en: Cody!
translation.zh: 科迪！

translation.en: Everything okay in there?
translation.zh: 里面还好吧？

translation.en: I'd really like to know what's going on in there.
translation.zh: 我很想知道里面的情况

translation.en: I promise you, we can work this out.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 事情会解决的

translation.en: Where's my wife?
translation.zh: 我妻子在哪儿？

translation.en: [Holden] It's a difficult situation. Taking a while to get her here.
translation.zh: 情况有点儿复杂 她过来还得一会儿

translation.en: -She doesn't want to talk to me? -[Holden] That's not it.
translation.zh: -她不想跟我说话？ -不是这样的

translation.en: She is very worried about you.
translation.zh: 她非常担心你

translation.en: -You talked to her? -[Holden] On the phone.
translation.zh: -你跟她说过话？ -电话里

translation.en: -Maybe you could talk to her on the phone. -No!
translation.zh: -不然你可以电话跟她说 -不行！

translation.en: She has to be here.
translation.zh: 她一定要来这里

translation.en: -[Holden] I understand your frustration. -[Miller] What do you understand?
translation.zh: -我知道你不开心 -你知道什么？

translation.en: [Holden] Not being able to communicate with a trusted loved one.
translation.zh: 不能跟真心相爱的人交流

translation.en: What do you want to say to her?
translation.zh: 你想跟她说什么？

translation.en: Why would I tell you?
translation.zh: 我干嘛要告诉你？

translation.en: Maybe I can help.
translation.zh: 说不定我可以帮忙

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 不用

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢 -不客气

translation.en: You followed procedure. You did your job. You did everything by the book.
translation.zh: 你遵守程序 履行了自己的职责 你一切行为都是照章办事

translation.en: He took hostages. He knew there'd be consequences.
translation.zh: 他既然劫持了人质 就知道会有后果

translation.en: -He thought he was invisible. -You're not his shrink.
translation.zh: -他觉得他是隐形人 -你不是他的心理医生

translation.en: You're not responsible for diagnosing him. That's not your remit.
translation.zh: 没有义务为他诊断 这不是你的职责

translation.en: These things happen in real time, and we are the last responders.
translation.zh: 这种事都是突发事件 最后关头才叫我们上

translation.en: If an operation's gonna go south, this is not the worst outcome.
translation.zh: 如果行动出现不测 这也不是最糟糕的结果

translation.en: Stay focused on what we do.
translation.zh: 专心做好本职工作就行了

translation.en: If I did everything by the book, it begs the question--
translation.zh: 如果我都是照章办事 那我有个问题…

translation.en: This place is pretty much the benchmark for excellence in law enforcement.
translation.zh: 霍顿 我们这里可是 执法部门的典范

translation.en: In the rest of the world, hostage negotiation's on its way out.
translation.zh: 在世界其他地方 人质谈判早就过时了

translation.en: You think the Israelis bothered to negotiate at Entebbe last year?
translation.zh: 你以为以色列人去年 在恩德培是真心想谈判？

translation.en: You didn't lose one hostage or bystander. That's how we measure success.
translation.zh: 人质和旁观者无一人受伤 这就是我们衡量成功的标准

translation.en: And your courses are a big hit in the summer.
translation.zh: 你的课夏天的时候很受欢迎

translation.en: I actually think you should be teaching more.
translation.zh: 我觉得你应该多去讲课

translation.en: -You're putting me out to pasture. -No.
translation.zh: -你这是要雪藏我 -不是

translation.en: I'm putting you to work where it really counts.
translation.zh: 我是调你去重要岗位

translation.en: Despite what happened. Because of what happened, Holden.
translation.zh: -在发生这件事以后？ -这正是调你去的原因 霍顿

translation.en: It seasoned you.
translation.zh: 这件事让你成熟了

translation.en: Thank you, sir...
translation.zh: 谢谢你 长官

translation.en: but I'd rather not.
translation.zh: 但我不愿意

translation.en: Well, this is awkward.
translation.zh: 这就尴尬了

translation.en: I'd like you to sleep on it over the weekend...
translation.zh: 你这个周末还是好好想想吧

translation.en: because you start full-time on Monday.
translation.zh: 因为下周一开始你要全职上课

translation.en: This is how we find ourselves completely out of control.
translation.zh: 此时事态失控

translation.en: The fugitive has already killed a police officer that morning in Austin.
translation.zh: 逃犯当天早上 已经在奥斯汀杀死一名警察

translation.en: He's taken two nine-millimeter rounds in the ass,
translation.zh: 他随身携带两把九毫米口径的手枪

translation.en: grabbed a ten-year-old boy as a hostage,
translation.zh: 劫持了一名十岁儿童作为人质

translation.en: and he's holed up in a suburban neighborhood
translation.zh: 他藏身市郊某个社区

translation.en: crawling with women and small children.
translation.zh: 那里聚集着大量妇女儿童

translation.en: Now we must focus on one thing:
translation.zh: 现在我们必须专注于一件事：

translation.en: de-escalation.
translation.zh: 那就是缓解局势

translation.en: San Antonio's chief of police arrives and starts using a bullhorn,
translation.zh: 圣安东尼奥警长到达现场后 使用扩音器开始喊话

translation.en: which more than effectively intimidates our hostage-taker.
translation.zh: 起到了震慑人质劫持者的作用

translation.en: Coming at anyone with an attitude of "I'm right, you're wrong"
translation.zh: 对付一个认定“我对你错”的人

translation.en: assumes that they're of rational mind.
translation.zh: 假设他们有理性

translation.en: We must establish communication.
translation.zh: 我们必须建立沟通

translation.en: Non-threatening communication.
translation.zh: 不带威胁意味的沟通

translation.en: Ascertain demands,
translation.zh: 弄清对方的要求

translation.en: concede nothing, reject nothing, just listen.
translation.zh: 不让步 不拒绝 只是倾听

translation.en: Listen to what he has to say.
translation.zh: 听劫持者有什么话要说

translation.en: Try understanding him instead of trying to dominate him.
translation.zh: 试着去理解他 而不是操控他

translation.en: Look for common ground.
translation.zh: 寻找共识

translation.en: Find commonality.
translation.zh: 找到共同点

translation.en: And if it feels like you're buying time, well... that's because you are.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得你是在拖延时间 那…事实就是如此

translation.en: But it's the key to making any perp feel heard.
translation.zh: 但关键是让罪犯感到有人听他倾诉

translation.en: [Holden] Our goal is no body bags.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是没有人员伤亡

translation.en: That is the hostage negotiator win-win.
translation.zh: 这才是人质谈判的双赢

translation.en: And I'm in my office on Friday for anyone who has questions
translation.zh: 我周五会在办公室 如果对心理策略考试有疑问

translation.en: about the psychological strategies exam.
translation.zh: 可以随时过来找我

translation.en: [man] Wanton, indiscriminate murder.
translation.zh: 漠视生命 见人就杀

translation.en: Seemingly random, serendipitous.
translation.zh: 随机作案 即兴杀人

translation.en: Each one, extremely violent.
translation.zh: 这种罪犯极其残忍

translation.en: No explanation. No apparent reason.
translation.zh: 无法解释 没有明显的理由

translation.en: They weren't sexually assaulted,
translation.zh: 她们没有遭到性侵

translation.en: there was no attempt to relieve them of valuables,
translation.zh: 也没有抢劫贵重物品的意图

translation.en: they didn't know their assailant.
translation.zh: 她们都不知道攻击者是谁

translation.en: Robert Violante and Stacy Moskowitz were making out in their car
translation.zh: 罗伯特·维尔朗特 和史黛西·默斯科唯茨正在车里亲热

translation.en: when David Berkowitz walked up and shot them both point-blank.
translation.zh: 大卫·柏克威兹上前 直接开枪杀死两人

translation.en: Berkowitz killed six people over two summers,
translation.zh: 柏克威兹两个夏天里一共杀死六人

translation.en: wounding seven more. Why?
translation.zh: 还有七人受伤 为什么？

translation.en: Because a dog told him to do it.
translation.zh: 因为受到一条狗的指使

translation.en: Now...
translation.zh: 现在…

translation.en: we can say that the guy's crazy, or that he's pretending that he's crazy.
translation.zh: 我们可以说这人脑子有毛病 或者他在假装自己神经病

translation.en: But if we're looking for a motive we can understand,
translation.zh: 但如果想要找出 一个可以令人理解的动机

translation.en: we suddenly find there is none.
translation.zh: 我们突然发现 根本就没有动机

translation.en: It's a void.
translation.zh: 一片虚空

translation.en: It's a black hole.
translation.zh: 就像黑洞一样深不可测

translation.en: Forty years ago, your FBI was founded hunting down John Dillinger,
translation.zh: 40年前 联邦调查局成立了 目的是追捕约翰·迪林杰

translation.en: Baby Face Nelson, Machine Gun Kelly.
translation.zh: “娃娃脸”纳尔逊、"机关枪"凯利

translation.en: Criminals who thumbed their noses at society,
translation.zh: 那些罪犯藐视社会

translation.en: but were basically in it for personal gain.
translation.zh: 但其实是为了获取个人利益

translation.en: Now, we have extreme violence between strangers.
translation.zh: 目前出现了陌生人极端暴力犯罪

translation.en: Where do we go...
translation.zh: 如果动机变得隐晦

translation.en: when motive becomes elusive?
translation.zh: 我们应该何去何从？

translation.en: Excuse me, Professor Rathman?
translation.zh: 请稍等 拉特曼教授？

translation.en: Holden Ford, Hostage Negotiation.
translation.zh: 我是霍顿·福特 教授人质谈判

translation.en: Peter. Hi.
translation.zh: 叫我彼得吧 你好

translation.en: I listened in on your class earlier. What you were saying about crime today...
translation.zh: 我刚才听了你的课 你关于当今犯罪的观点

translation.en: I don't know, it really resonates.
translation.zh: 我不知该怎么说 反响很大

translation.en: -Gets attention. -Were you teaching this before Berkowitz?
translation.zh: -学生确实有兴趣 -你之前就在教这个吗？

translation.en: A version of it. The headlines kind of fell into my lap.
translation.zh: 算是吧 那些头条引起了我的注意

translation.en: What got you started?
translation.zh: 当初是怎么开始的？

translation.en: Starkweather. Whitman. Manson, of course.
translation.zh: 当然是因为 斯塔克韦瑟、惠特曼、曼森

translation.en: But Son of Sam kind of epitomizes now.
translation.zh: 但目前“山姆之子”是个典型

translation.en: It's as if... we don't know anymore what moves people to kill one another.
translation.zh: 就像…我们再也无从得知 人们的杀人动机

translation.en: Used to be you find a victim with 50 stab wounds,
translation.zh: 之前如果发现受害者被捅50刀

translation.en: you look for the jilted lover, the ex-business partner.
translation.zh: 我们会调查被抛弃的情人 或者前商业合作伙伴

translation.en: Now... it could be a random run-in with a disgruntled mailman.
translation.zh: 而现在…可能是心怀不满的 邮递员随机杀人

translation.en: It's a different era. No more "Just the facts, ma'am."
translation.zh: 时代变了 没人说“夫人 请讲事实”了

translation.en: That's television. And reruns.
translation.zh: 那是电视剧 而且有重播

translation.en: -Crime has changed. -Right.
translation.zh: -犯罪已经今非昔比 -是的

translation.en: Do you... want to grab a beer?
translation.zh: 能…一起喝一杯吗？

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: [Rathman] Look at the unprecedented events
translation.zh: 想想过去15年里发生的

translation.en: that have occurred in the past decade and a half.
translation.zh: 那些史无前例的事件

translation.en: A president assassinated.
translation.zh: 总统被刺杀？

translation.en: Fighting an unpopular war that we didn't win.
translation.zh: 输了并不受民众支持的战争？

translation.en: National Guard killing four college students.
translation.zh: 国民警卫队成员杀死四名大学生

translation.en: -You can hardly wrap your mind around it. -Watergate.
translation.zh: -简直让人们毫无头绪 -水门事件

translation.en: Our democracy is vanishing into what?
translation.zh: 我们的民主究竟要消亡到何种程度？

translation.en: Is that what all this is about?
translation.zh: 这都是怎么回事？

translation.en: Just a response to turmoil?
translation.zh: 仅仅是对动荡局势的回应吗？

translation.en: The government used to be, symbolically, a parental institution.
translation.zh: 以前有政府这个家长管着

translation.en: Now? It's a free-for-all.
translation.zh: 现在呢？混乱不堪 毫无秩序

translation.en: The world barely makes any sense, so it follows that crime doesn't either.
translation.zh: 这世界已经毫无理性 犯罪动机也随之变得冲动随意

translation.en: You and I could theorize all night, but the truth is, I don't fucking know.
translation.zh: 听着 理论我们可以讲一晚上 但事实是 我不知道答案

translation.en: -I don't know either. -No one does.
translation.zh: -我也不知道 -没有人知道

translation.en: But we're supposed to, right?
translation.zh: 但我们理应知道的 对吧？

translation.en: Sure, but here's the troubling thing: no one's even asking the questions.
translation.zh: 当然了 可不幸的是 都没有人问这些问题

translation.zh: -我们帮不上忙 -我们需要更多时间梳理

translation.zh: 我研究了所有资料 跟你来到这里

translation.zh: 认真倾听你好心教给我的知识

translation.zh: 如果你不喜欢 回去教你那些乳臭未干的学生

translation.zh: 就当这事儿没发生过

translation.zh: 艾达和她儿子遇害

translation.zh: 不是“淫乐杀人”

translation.zh: 不是什么“生性残忍”的人 随机“寻乐杀人”

translation.zh: 也不是某个偷内裤的小毛贼 想要改变犯罪风格

translation.zh: 这是异常行为

translation.zh: 霍顿 我来告诉你什么是“异常行为”

translation.zh: -或许真该写一篇 -为什么？

translation.zh: 我们的工作是帮他解开 他自己解不开的难题

translation.zh: -我可是担着风险在帮你 -恕我直言

translation.zh: 我问你 你是哪儿的人？

translation.zh: 好的 你现在的情况 也是一种“大杂烩”

translation.zh: 我再问你 你有女朋友吗？

translation.zh: 下次你远离家乡 觉得烦躁不安的时候
